title: Don’t Stop!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>A-i-Chaaaaan! Lend me your ears for a bit!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>What, what? That face looks like the face of someone that is planning something~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>*whisper whisper*.... *whisper whisper*.... Okay? How about it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Seeeeeeeeeeeeriously!? Then we have to do it!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Right, right? But Umi-chan said, “If you don’t properly plan it a little bit more, it’s dangerous”....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ah…. Hmm, Umi is right about that. Shizuku would probably say the same….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>But, but~! Ai-chan, can you just stay still!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Of course not!! Alright, Honoka! Our only path is forward!! When we get scolded, it’s together!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yaay! I thought Ai-chan would say that! If it’s the two of us, getting scolded isn’t so scary right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
